The legendary rodent copulator, as Ted Cruz once put it — who says he has two tickets, one for him and one for his libel lawyer — will see then for the first time what co-directors Dylan Bank, Daniel DiMauro and Morgan Pehme have made of his life's work over five-and-a-half years following him.
His tunnel vision is the subject of "Get Me Roger Stone," debuting Sunday at the Tribeca Film Festival.
